long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge Your Dropshipping with Sell The Trend’s Chrome Extension

Level up your dropshipping game with Sell The Trend’s powerful, easy-to-use Chrome extension. Collect and save Facebook ads,  see e-commerce stores sales data, access detailed competitor insights, and discover their top winning products instantly.

Join thousands of successful dropshippers using Sell The Trend to gain a competitive edge.

Make Sell The Trend your ultimate dropshipping tool today!

🔑 Key Features

1. Track Stores & See Store Revenue
See store revenue e-commerce store. Track orders and revenue with Sell The Trend’s Store Intelligence too giving you the insights needed to make data-driven decisions for your store.

2. Facebook Ads Collection
Save Facebook ads automatically in your own personal library to study effective ad campaigns in your niche. Sell The Trend lets you analyze what works best, helping you create ads that convert—without the guesswork.

3. Store Analysis
Unlock powerful insights on any competitor store with Sell The Trend’s store intelligence. View store revenue, best sellers, latest products and installed apps providing you with everything you need to sharpen your own strategy and stand out.

5. Competitor App Reveal
"ee the apps driving competitor stores' success. Discover which tools they use and apply winning strategies to grow your own store.

4. Product Import with One Click
Add top products from competitor stores, Aliexpress and CJDropshipping to your own store with just one click. Sell The Trend’s one-click import feature simplifies product research and streamlines your inventory setup so you can focus on selling.

🎯 Track Stores & Revenue

Track Stores and see detailed revenue data for any e-commerce store. Get insights on revenue and more with Sell The Trend’s Store Intelligence, helping you make better, data-driven decisions and grow your store confidently.

💾 Facebook Ads Collection

Automatically save and organize Facebook ads to see what’s working in real time. With Sell The Trend’s ads library, you can analyze the most effective ad styles and messaging for your market, making it easy to create campaigns that resonate and convert.

🔎 Competitor Store Analysis

Gain detailed insights on any e-commerce store with Sell The Trend’s store analysis. Access key data on store design, product selections, and best-selling items. These insights provide a roadmap for strengthening your strategy and capturing more market share.

🕵️‍♂️ Reveal Competitor Tools

Uncover the apps and tools competitors are using to boost their sales. Sell The Trend lets you see what’s powering other stores so you can adopt the best strategies and stay competitive.

💡 Discover Winning Products Instantly

Simplify product research by importing high-demand items directly from competitor stores. Spy, select, and sell using Sell The Trend’s one-click import tool, taking the hassle out of finding products that will perform well.

➕ More SellTheTrend.com Features

📱 TikTok Spy Tool
Discover trending products and successful ad strategies with Sell The Trend’s TikTok Spy Tool. Instantly access top-performing ads and viral products on TikTok, allowing you to capture what’s hot and replicate winning ideas.

📦 Supplier Directory
"Find top-quality suppliers with ease through Sell The Trend’s Supplier Directory. Access a network of verified suppliers offering fast local shipping options from the U.S., U.K., and more. Our directory helps you compare prices, shipping times, and ratings, so you always make the best sourcing decisions for your store. 

🚚 Automated Order Fulfillment
"Streamline your order processing with Sell The Trend’s automated fulfillment feature. With a single click, send orders directly to suppliers who handle the packaging, shipping, and tracking. This will free up your time to focus on scaling your store.

🕵️‍♂️ Effortless Niche Discovery

Use Sell The Trend’s advanced niche spy to quickly locate profitable niches. Target emerging markets with confidence and watch your store grow with a variety of in-demand products.

💵 Your Go-To Free Chrome Extension
